the Philadelphia 76ers to an 83-81 victory over the Boston Celtics that evened their Eastern Conference first-round series at two games each. "Win. It's the only thing we can think about," Allen Iverson said. We fought hard to get back in the series. We're really not thinking about anything more. The only thing I care about is finishing out. After shooting poorly all game, Allen Iverson made his last three shots and two clinching free throws that sent the series between the long-Tim Thomase rivals back to Boston for Game Five on Friday.
